org.neuroph.nnet.flat
Class FlatWeight

java.lang.Object
  org.neuroph.core.Weight
      org.neuroph.nnet.flat.FlatWeight
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class FlatWeight
extends Weight

A subclass of the Weight class. Allows weights to be stored as elements in a double type array. This allows weights to very quickly be modified, affecting the neural network.

See Also:
FlatNetworkPlugin, Serialized Form
